original_text:
So Jeroboam’s wife did what he said and went to Ahijah’s house in Shiloh.
Now Ahijah could not see; his sight was gone because of his age.
korean_text: 여로보암의 아내가 그대로 하여 일어나 실로로 가서 아히야의 집에 이르니 아히야는 나이가 많아 눈이 어두워 보지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: So Jeroboam's wife did what he said
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 여로보암의 아내는 그가 말한 것을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and went to Ahijah's house in Shiloh.
his sight was gone because of his age.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 시력은 그의 나이 때문에 사라졌습니다.
